nodes.text: Mokan was a male Rattataki living during the Galactic War. At some point he became part of the Order of Revan and joined with the Revanite forces on Rishi. During the Battle of Rishi in 3637 BBY he was attacked by a strike team that tried to reach the signal jammer on the Razorback Island and was killed.
Commander Mokan appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
